feed.title: Woolly Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Whalebird: 6.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5128
  • Update dependency sass to v1.83.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5120
  • Update dependency eslint to v9.17.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5122
  • [Auto update] Thirdparty libraries list by @github-actions in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5125
  • Update typescript-eslint monorepo to v8.19.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5126
  • Update dependency sanitize-html to v2.14.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5129
  • Update dependency tailwindcss to v3.4.17 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5127
  • Update dependency next to v14.2.22 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5130
  • Update dependency eslint-plugin-react to v7.37.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5131
  • Update Yarn to v4.6.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5132
  • Update dependency @types/node to v22.10.5 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5134
  • Update dependency megalodon to v10.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5133
  • Update dependency react-intl to v7.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5135
  • Validate attachments when sns is pixelfed by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5138
  • Stop load more if finished by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5139
  • Add reload button on timelines by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5141
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5140
  • [Auto update] Thirdparty libraries list by @github-actions in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5136
  • Update dependency next to v14.2.23 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5142
  • Update dependency megalodon to v10.1.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5144

Full Changelog: https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/compare/v6.1.8...v6.2.0

entry.title: New release for Whalebird: 6.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update readme for pixelfed by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5148
  • Update dependency electron to v34 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5155

  • Update dependency electron-builder to v25 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5035
  • Update dependency electron to v34.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5169
  • [Auto update] Thirdparty libraries list by @github-actions in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5170
  • refs #4646 Update avatar after launching by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5171

Full Changelog: https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/compare/v6.2.0...v6.2.1

entry.title: New release for Whalebird: 6.2.2

entry.title: New release for Whalebird: 6.2.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refs #5159 Add show boosts option on timelines by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5228

  • Update eslint monorepo to v9.28.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5225
  • Update dependency sanitize-html to v2.17.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5222
  • Update dependency electron to v36 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5216
  • Update dependency @babel/runtime-corejs3 to v7.27.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5229
  • Update dependency postcss to v8.5.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5230

entry.title: New release for Whalebird: 6.2.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Use electron-builder native notarize instead of electron-notarize by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5249
  • Update dependency electron to v37 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5245
  • Update dependency electron to v37.2.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5253
  • Open status detail when clicking status body by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5254
  • Update dependency megalodon to v10.1.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5235
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5256

Full Changelog: https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/compare/v6.2.3...v6.2.4
